title: 日本ダービーの後に・天命砕きて至るは

text.jpText:
サクラチヨノオーたちとの激しい競り合いの
果てに限界を超え、見事『日本ダービー』を
制するメジロアルダン。
text.enText:
After a fierce competition with Sakura 
Chiono O. and other competitors, she 
overcame her limits and won the "Japan 
Derby" in a spectacular manner. Mejiro 
Ardan wins the "Japan Derby.

text.jpText:
勝利の余韻に浸る中でメジロアルダンは、
自分が姉の威光を超えるという目的を
忘れていたことを認識し、ある気づきを得る。
text.enText:
In the afterglow of her victory, Mejiro Aldan 
realized that she had forgotten her goal of 
surpassing her sister's prestige. In the 
afterglow of her victory, Mejiro Aldan 
realized that she had forgotten her goal of 
surpassing her sister's prestige.

text.jpText:
その気づきとは、サクラチヨノオーたち
愛すべきライバルとの全身全霊の戦いこそ、
自分の走りを更に輝かせるというものだった。
text.enText:
What she realized was that fighting with all 
her might against her beloved rivals, such as 
Sakura Chiono O and others, was the only 
thing that would make her own running shine 
even brighter. Sakura Chiono'o and other 
beloved rivals.

text.jpText:
メジロアルダンは自分を高めてくれた
ライバルの存在に深く感謝しつつ、
新たな領域へと歩みを進めるのであった……！
text.enText:
Mejiro Aldan is deeply grateful to her rivals 
for helping her to improve herself. She is 
now moving on to new territory. ……!
